summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 CHEVROLET EQUINOX. WHILE DRIVING OUT OF A PARKING SPACE, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE, BUT THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AUTONATION CHEVROLET NORTH RICHLAND HILLS (7769 BOULEVARD 26, NORTH RICHLAND HILLS, TX 76180 (682) 214-2010) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED WITH A FAULTY LEFT SOLENOID INTAKE. THE SOLENOID VALVE INTAKE WAS REPLACED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED A MONTH LATER. THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED AND THE VEHICLE STALLED. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE BACK TO THE DEALER FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING THAT GENERATED MULTIPLE CODES. THE CONTACT WAS UNAWARE OF THE ACTUAL FAILURE OR REPAIRS THAT WERE NEEDED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 32,476.
